name: Underground (CP Verlag)
overview: An Arcade - Collect'em Up style game published in Magic Disk 64 1989/10. Henry is the hero of the game UNDERGROUND, and as befits a real game hero, Henry has a job too. Henry's job is to collect all the stones marked with an EXIT . When all EXIT's have been collected in one screen, Henry goes to the next level. When 8 screens have been completed, our hero is also done, and he can take a short break while the next level is being reloaded from disk (8 screens per level and 26 levels per disk makes a total of 200 screens per disk!!!). Earth: is not a problem for Henry, but holds stones and ally's back. Stones: always fall down, until they hit an obstacle bump. Walls: Can't be moved by anything or anyone. Exits: Like walls, but Henry can collect them. Beds: Like exits, but if Henry has collected one then you can rest for a certain time.
